name: Raemar, rap and reality TV
description: James Turrell's immersive artworks have an unusual connection with Saturday Night Live, hip hop and reality TV royalty.

key_work.title: Raemar, Blue
key_work.credit_line: Tate: Presented by the Tate Americas Foundation, partial purchase and partial gift of Doris J. Lockhart 2013
key_work.brief_description: Turrell’s installations are intended to produce a state of self-reflection and contemplation, encouraging viewers to become aware of the process of looking and the limits of perception.

constellations_primary.name: Raemar, rap and reality TV
constellations_primary.description: James Turrell's immersive artworks have an unusual connection with Saturday Night Live, hip hop and reality TV royalty.

constellations_other.name: Expansive light in science fiction and fantasy
constellations_other.description: Visual artists have identified the importance of light in revealing the expansiveness of our universe. Explore how artists’ perception of light has been adapted and referenced in science fiction and fantasy on screen.

end.title: Keeping Up with the Kardashians

video_links.name: Las Kardashian - Todos los lunes a las 22.00 en FOX Life

end.brief_description: A peek inside the exploits and privileged private lives of the blended Kardashian-Jenner family, including sisters Kim, Kourtney and Khloé.

constellations_other.name: If at first you don't succeed
constellations_other.description: Though originally intended as a laugh, Celeste Baber’s social media posts have become examples of body positivity to her eight million followers and challenge the absurd expectations put on women in society.

constellations_other.name: Reality TV me
constellations_other.description: Cult documentary Grey Gardens follows the everyday eccentricities of mother and daughter Big Edie and Little Edie. The women perform and speak candidly to the camera, and have been described as predecessors to reality TV stars.

constellations_other.name: Raemar, rap and reality TV
constellations_other.description: James Turrell's immersive artworks have an unusual connection with Saturday Night Live, hip hop and reality TV royalty.

links.description: While married to Jenner’s sister Kim Kardashian, West would appear in their reality TV show, Keeping Up with the Kardashians.

start.title: Jesus Is King
start.creator_credit: Nick Knight, Kanye West and IMAX
start.brief_description: Filmed in the summer of 2019, Jesus Is King brings Kanye West’s famed Sunday Service to life in the Roden Crater, visionary artist James Turrell’s never-before-seen installation in Arizona’s Painted Desert. This one-of-a-kind experience features songs arranged by West in the gospel tradition along with new music from his forthcoming album.

constellations_other.name: Raemar, rap and reality TV
constellations_other.description: James Turrell's immersive artworks have an unusual connection with Saturday Night Live, hip hop and reality TV royalty.

end.title: Inside Kendall Jenner’s Cozy L.A. Hideaway

constellations_other.name: Raemar, rap and reality TV
constellations_other.description: James Turrell's immersive artworks have an unusual connection with Saturday Night Live, hip hop and reality TV royalty.

links.description: A long-time fan of Turrell’s work, West introduced the artist’s immersive artworks to his then sister-in-law Kendall Jenner, who purchased Turrell’s Scorpius, Medium Elliptical Glass (2019) for a rumoured $750,000 USD, which can be seen in this Architecture Digest tour of her home.

start.brief_description: Turrell’s installations are intended to produce a state of self-reflection and contemplation, encouraging viewers to become aware of the process of looking and the limits of perception.

end.title: Jesus Is King
end.creator_credit: Nick Knight, Kanye West and IMAX
end.brief_description: Filmed in the summer of 2019, Jesus Is King brings Kanye West’s famed Sunday Service to life in the Roden Crater, visionary artist James Turrell’s never-before-seen installation in Arizona’s Painted Desert. This one-of-a-kind experience features songs arranged by West in the gospel tradition along with new music from his forthcoming album.

constellations_other.name: Raemar, rap and reality TV
constellations_other.description: James Turrell's immersive artworks have an unusual connection with Saturday Night Live, hip hop and reality TV royalty.

links.description: In 2019, Kanye West created a documentary of his performance of album Jesus is King at the Roden Crater, James Turrell’s large-scale artwork created within a volcanic cinder cone in the Painted Desert in Northern Arizona.

end.title: Saturday Night Live
end.brief_description: A late-night live television sketch comedy and variety show created by Lorne Michaels. The show’s comedy sketches, which parody contemporary culture and politics, are performed by a large and varying cast of repertory and newer cast members. Each episode is hosted by a celebrity guest, who usually delivers an opening monologue and performs in sketches with the cast, and features performances by a musical guest.

constellations_other.name: Women and crime
constellations_other.description: The allure and fascination of dangerous women and women in danger.

constellations_other.name: Raemar, rap and reality TV
constellations_other.description: James Turrell's immersive artworks have an unusual connection with Saturday Night Live, hip hop and reality TV royalty.

links.description: Both Kim Kardashian and Kanye West have appeared on Saturday Night Live, where the former met her current boyfriend Pete Davidson and the latter controversially appeared in a red Make America Great Again cap, apparently signalling his support for Donald Trump.

start.title: Saturday Night Live
start.brief_description: A late-night live television sketch comedy and variety show created by Lorne Michaels. The show’s comedy sketches, which parody contemporary culture and politics, are performed by a large and varying cast of repertory and newer cast members. Each episode is hosted by a celebrity guest, who usually delivers an opening monologue and performs in sketches with the cast, and features performances by a musical guest.

constellations_other.name: Raemar, rap and reality TV
constellations_other.description: James Turrell's immersive artworks have an unusual connection with Saturday Night Live, hip hop and reality TV royalty.

links.description: Donald Trump has hosted Saturday Night Live twice. In 2015, a year before he won the American presidency on the back of his Make America Great Again slogan, he appeared in a skit for Drake’s “Hotline Bling”.

constellations_other.name: Raemar, rap and reality TV
constellations_other.description: James Turrell's immersive artworks have an unusual connection with Saturday Night Live, hip hop and reality TV royalty.

links.description: The colourful background that Drake dances in front of in the original “Hotline Bling” video is based on Turrell’s immersive artworks, though the artist wasn’t officially involved, issuing a statement saying “neither I nor my woes was involved in any way”.
